page.title: 15The Animal Man, Smestow
page.content: Mrs Harvey told all the children to go to the classroom door. We had to go to the Hall to wait for the Animal Man. His real name is Mr Pearson. He comes to Westfield First School every year. When he came he had 2 skunks and a snake. He gave the snake to my friend but she ran away from it.He asked us to be very quiet. His helper brought in a falcon which sat on his special glove. He lifted his arm and the falcon flew across the hall. We all kept our heads very low. The falcon flew towards a window and hit the glass. It fell to the floor. When it got up it flew back to the Animal Man's hand.We enjoyed his visit very much. The Animal Man lives near us now. All his animals are at the Smestow Mill Wildlife Park in Wombourne.
